title: Resolution incompatible error
body:
I just installed a fresh copy of the game everytime i run the game normally the screen goes black and says (In compaitable resolution 1366x768 60HZ).
So i youtube Videos and saw that i can go to game Config and make window mode 1 or 2, well now the game works but i have worst issue when ever i move my crossor to check my surroundings, it goes well upwards Right and left.. but backwards it just stops .. it doesn't go back ward so inorder for me to return to my character i have to press Y .. I died in 200 of timefights recently just cause of me lost trying to find where am being hit from outside my Y Screen lock range or where is that jungler coming from, The support almost didn't read my ticket and responded automatically after waiting for 2 days for his response .. so yeah anyone here offering a help hand please?

replies.body: Still no help after 1 day ... i wanna play god..

Thank you i did hit the support team but the support who is answering me, Read the first ticket and not the second reply .. after 2 days of waiting .. it is hard to stay waiting that long and not playing and after i wait i get a respond with a solution that i already stated above that i did Try it out fully.

The resolution reduction was intended as a workaround for an out of signal or fullscreen issue that some players had a while back.  Hit us up in [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually to find out what's going on.  We'll reply back asap and work towards getting you back to full screen.
